Counteract.DCHint: If you're counteracting an affliction, the DC is in the affliction's stat block. If it's a spell, use the caster's DC. The GM can also calculate a DC based on the target effect's level.
Counteract.Label: Counteract ($s)
Counteract.RankHint: If an effect is a spell, its rank is the counteract rank. Otherwise, halve its level and round up to determine its counteract rank (minimum counteract rank 0). If an effect's level is unclear and it came from a creature, halve and round up the creature's level.

CSS.GroupContainerHint: CSS overrides for the roll group container element.
CSS.GroupHeaderHint: CSS overrides for the roll group header element.
CSS.OuterContainerHint: CSS overrides for the outermost container element.
CSS.RollContainerHint: CSS overrides for the individual roll container elements.

GMDialog.AlwaysAddNameHint: Always append the name of a skill or action to the check label.
GMDialog.AutoCloseHint: Whether the dialog should be closed automatically after a request was sent.

ResultsDialog.ShowHint: Whether to show the results dialog after a request was sent.

RollDialog.AutoCloseHint: Whether the dialog should be closed automatically after a roll was clicked.
RollDialog.playSoundInBackgroundHint: Whether to play a sound when a new roll dialog opens while the browser is in the background.
